Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda ek hai
na usane kisee ko jana na usako kisee ne jana
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main subah ke maalik kee
har cheez kee buraee se jo usane paida kee panaah maangata hoon
aur andhereeraat kee buraee se jab usaka andhera chha jae
aur gandon par phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se
(jab phoonke) aur hasad karane vaale kee buraee se
(ai rasool) tum kah do main logon ke paravaradigaar
vasavase kee buraee se panaah maangata hoon
jo (khuda ke naam se) peechhe hat jaata hai jo logon ke dilon mein vasavase daala karata hai
jinnaat mein se khvaah aadamiyon mein se
